doc.after: One of Grand Cayman's main attractions is Seven Mile Beach, site of a number of the island's hotels and resorts. Named one of the Ultimate Beaches by Caribbean Travel and Life, Seven Mile Beach is on the western shore of Grand Cayman Island. It is a public property and possible to walk the full length of the beach, past all the hotels, resorts, and public beach bars.[37] Historical sites in Grand Cayman, such as Pedro St James Castle in Savannah, also attract visitors.[38] Tourists also visit the Sister Islands, Little Cayman[39] and Cayman Brac.[40]
